comments.html: As an RSS follower, I enjoyed seeing you pop up in my reader! Your stuff is always concise and to the point, which I was always super excited about. Glad the the experience was positive for you as the writer too!

I've really liked reading your posts over the past month. It's cool seeing a mix of personal and more techy notes. I noticed too late to join #WeblogPoMo2024, but you inspired me to try my own 30 day challenge!
